user.title: Switch Energy Statistics Configuration
user.description: Configure energy monitoring for your switch. For multi-gang devices, select ANY gang of the device (e.g. switch.cozinha, switch.living, etc.) - the integration will track all gangs individually.

data.switch_entity: Switch Entity (any gang from your multi-gang device)
data.gang_count: Number of Gangs (total gangs in the device)
data.name: Name (friendly name for this device)

gang_config.title: Gang Power Configuration
gang_config.description: Set power consumption for each gang of your multi-gang switch. Each gang represents a separate switch channel that can be controlled independently.

error.invalid_switch_entity: Selected switch entity is not valid or not found
error.no_switch_entities: No switch entities found. Please ensure you have switches or lights configured in Home Assistant.

abort.no_switch_entities: No switch or light entities found in your Home Assistant installation. Please add some switches/lights first.

init.title: Update Gang Power Settings
